intro: Mitragyna speciosa, commonly known as kratom, is a tropical evergreen tree native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which also includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dark green, leathery leaves and small, white, five-petaled flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains several elliptical seeds. The plant's botanical features make it easily identifiable in its natural habitat.
